title: Start living large! You'll love our 2 bed, 2 bath! 1144 Sq Ft!
posting_body: ['Come and see what the fuss is all about at The Covington Apartments, located at 5800 American Blvd W Bloomington, MN 55437.', 'Description', '........', "If you're looking for a pet-friendly community with a variety of nearby activities, then check out Covington Apartment Homes today.", 'We have several different open floor plans that are sure to fit your lifestyle needs.', 'Contact Weidner Apartment Homes to check availability and learn about our leasing options.', 'Our amazing staff is excited to help you and your family become the newest residents of Bloomington, MN!', 'show contact info', 'Bedrooms', '........... 2', 'Bathrooms', '......... 2', 'Sq Footage', '......... 1144 sq ft', 'Unit Price', '........... $2335/Month', 'Lease Term', '........', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'Amenity List', '......', '● Bike Storage', '● Business Center', '● Cardio Machines', '● Coffee Station', '● Elevator', '● Fire Pits', '● Movie Theater', '● Online Payments', '● Pond', '● Pool', '● 24-Hour Fitness Center', '● Barbecue/Grill Area', '● Corporate Suites', '● Dry Cleaning Service', '● Kingsley Excellence Award', '● Massages Offered', '● Package Receiving', '● Pet Washing Station', '● Planned Social Activities', '● Reservable Clubhouse', 'Unit Features', '.....', '● 9 Foot Ceilings', '● Air Conditioning', '● Floor to Ceiling Windows', '● Full-Size Washer/Dryer in Every Home', '● Maple Cabinetry', '● Microwave', '● Patio/Balcony', '● Plank Flooring', '● Sliding Glass Doors', '● Smoke Free', 'Our Pet Policy', '...', 'Pet Friendly - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $300.00, Rent $40.00, Deposit $200.00, Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'Leasing Hours', '...', 'Mon - Thu: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Fri - Sat: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Call our Office', '... at', 'show contact info', 'to schedule a private tour today.', 'Our Location', '.....', '5800 American Blvd W', 'Bloomington, MN 55437', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Professionally managed by Weidner Apartment Homes, LLC', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '49AE74D1469046']
